name: .WMD File Extension
summary: Learn about .WMD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Zip compressed file used by Windows Media Player; may store multimedia content, playlists, and borders (custom interfaces); used as a format for downloading audio and video over the Internet.

content: WMD files are .ZIP files that use the ".wmd" extension so that Windows Media Player opens them by default. You can decompress them manually with any Zip-compatible decompression utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
